title: Homestead National Monument of America: Special Guest Speakers
body: Special Guest Speakers       A Homestead Celebration: The Dedication of Homestead National Monument of America's award winning Heritage Center took place May 20th, 2007. Click on the links below to view presentations by the President of the Nicodemus Historical Society, Angela Bates and the presentation from the Professor of History at the University of Arkansas, Dr. Elliot West. Dr. Elliot West Professor of History University of Arkansas [11 minutes][wmv file]  Â                      Angela Bates Presentation by President of the Nicodemus Historical Society.  Duration:9 minutes, 8 seconds
